content.text: 1 cup firmly packed sliced fresh spinach
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 cup firmly packed sliced fresh spinach" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, lightly toss bread and water.
1) In a skillet, saute celery, onion and mushrooms in oil until tender, stirring constantly.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "saute"@17:22 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "celery"@23:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "onion"@31:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "mushrooms"@41:50 / FOOD )
		:loc ( ing-6 "oil"@54:57 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until tender"@58:70 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:simultaneous ( ac-1-1 "stirring"@72:80 / AC )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a skillet"@6:15 / TOOL )
	)
)

( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "remaining ingredients"@7:28 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-7 )
			:ref ( ing-8 )
			:ref ( ing-9 )
			:ref ( ing-10 )
			:ref ( ing-11 )
			:ref ( ing-12 )
			:ref ( ing-13 )
			:ref ( ing-14 )
			:ref ( ing-15 )
			:ref ( ing-16 )
		)
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "mix"@30:33 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Cover and bake at 350 degrees F (176 degrees C) for 30 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "bake"@13:17 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "350 degrees F"@21:34 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-5-1 "176 degrees C"@-1:-1 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "30 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
	)
)
